org.gwtbootstrap3.client.ui.form.validator

Interface HasValidators<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the generic type
    All Superinterfaces:
    HasHandlers, ValidationChangedEvent.HasValidationChangedHandlers
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlankValidatorMixin, BooleanRadioGroup, DefaultValidatorMixin, DoubleBox, DoubleRadioGroup, Input, IntegerBox, IntegerRadioGroup, LongBox, RadioGroupBase, RadioGroupBlankValidatorMixin, StringRadioGroup, SuggestBox, TextArea, TextBox, TextBoxBase, ValueBoxBase, ValueListBox

    public interface HasValidators<T>
extends ValidationChangedEvent.HasValidationChangedHandlers
    Should use when implementing classes with Validators.
    Author:
    Steven Jardine
